title: Module Object Schema
description: A schema describing the structure of a module object with various properties.

mycode.description: The unique code for the module, in the format {school}_{index}_{year}_{campus}, where {year} and {campus} are as below, {school} is the code for the school offering the module (see the belongsTo field), and {index} stands for the index of the row in which the module appears on the search page based on {campus}, {year}, {school}. This code would be stable in a single scraping, but not in the long run.

campus.description: The campus where the module is offered. 'C' for China, 'M' for Malaysia, 'U' for United Kingdom.

year.description: The academic year of the module.

credits.description: The number of credits associated with the module, stored as a string.

level.description: The level of the module, stored as a string.

summary.description: A summary of the module (HTML content).

aims.description: The aims of the module (HTML content).

offering.description: The name of the school offering the module.

convenor.description: The name of the module convenor.

semester.description: The semester during which the module is taught.

requisites.description: A list of requisite modules for the module.

code.description: The code of the requisite module.

additionalRequirements.description: A list of additional requirements for the module.

outcome.description: The learning outcome of the module (HTML content).

targetStudents.description: The target students for the module.

assessmentPeriod.description: The assessment period for the module.

class.description: A list of class details for the module.

numOfWeeks.description: The number of weeks the class runs, e.g. '10 weeks'.

numOfSessions.description: The number of sessions in total.

assessment.description: A list of assessments for the module.

weight.description: The percentage weight of the assessment, stored as a string, e.g. '100.00'.

requirements.description: Any specific requirements for the assessment.

belongsTo.description: Information about the school to which the module belongs.

campus.description: The campus where the school is located.

classComment.description: Any additional comments about the class.
